scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: As this collection has grown significantly in terms of the materials in regard to the Appalachian Development Highway System, it has since become its own section. The materials that used to be here can now be located under the heading "Appalachian Development Highway System," following the Local Development Districts. Individual final reports can also be found in the "Final Project Reports" section, under both individual states and regional.
